name: google-factcheck-explorer-bot-lambda
description: backend function for suggesting google ClaimReview items
author: Meedan

scripts.build: rm -f google-factcheck-explorer-bot-lambda.zip && zip -9 -r --exclude=*configurator* --exclude=*test* --exclude=google-factcheck-explorer-bot-lambda.zip google-factcheck-explorer-bot-lambda.zip * && echo 'Now upload google-factcheck-explorer-bot-lambda.zip to AWS Lambda'
